com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents

Class DocumentSearchCache<T extends PluginDocument>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.DocumentSearchCache<T>

  • public class DocumentSearchCache<T extends PluginDocument>
extends Object
    Class which caches the results of a search for a particular type of document and automatically updates to include newly added documents of the particular type when they are added to the user's database.

    All cached results are permanently kept in memory, so this class should only be used on document types for which only a few results are expected.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocumentSearchCacheFor

        public static <T extends PluginDocument> DocumentSearchCache<T> getDocumentSearchCacheFor(DocumentType<T> documentType)
        Gets a cache for the given document type, creating the cache if necessary and caching the cache so that future calls to this method return the same cache.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        documentType - the type of document to find all occurances of.
        Returns:

      • addDocumentsUpdatedListener

        public void addDocumentsUpdatedListener(SimpleListener listener)
        Add a listener to be fired when the list of documents in the cache changes (either because new documents are added or old documents have been deleted).

        The listener is only weakly referenced by this cache so once nothing other than this cache references the listener, it will be discarded and no longer notified.

        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to notify.

      • getDocumentType

        public DocumentType<T> getDocumentType()
        Returns:
        the DocumentType representing the type of documents this DocumentSearchCache will search for
        Since:
        API 4.14 (Geneious 5.1)

      • getDocuments

        public List<AnnotatedPluginDocument> getDocuments()
        Returns:
        list of all documents in the cache. These documents will have their PluginDocuments cached in memory, so clients of this method can safely use AnnotatedPluginDocument.getDocumentOrCrash().

      • hasSearchedEntireDatabase

        public boolean hasSearchedEntireDatabase()
        Returns:
        true if the search has finished it's initial search of the database (however, it will still pick up new documents added in the future). Use addDocumentsUpdatedListener(org.virion.jam.util.SimpleListener) to find out when documents have been added to or removed from the cache.
